data.title: We know that there are four Father-Son pairs who have won the Nobel Prize in #Physics. We have posted about the three pairs. Now, here,...
data.meta_description:
312 likes, 1 comments - cosmological_astrophysics on October 2, 2023: "We know that there are four Father-Son pairs who have won the Nobel Prize in #Physics. We have posted about the three pairs. Now, here, this is 4th article (& last article). But don't forget, tomorrow is the announcement day for Physics Nobel Prize Winners of the year 2023. 

(Father-Son Nobel Prize Winners in Physics - 4) - -

This article is about two Swedish physicists Karl Manne Georg Siegbahn (father) & Kai Manne BÃ¶rje Siegbahn (son). 

#ManneSiebahn was an experimental physicist who understood electron shell system experimentally by means of x-ray spectroscopy. He won the Nobel Prize in 1924 for his precision measurements that drove many developments in quantum theory and atomic physics. 

#KaiSiegbahn shared the 1981 Nobel Prize in Physics (received 1/2 of the prize) for his contribution to the development of high-resolution electron spectroscopy. 

Now, you can get our all articles on Twitter also. Follow here, https://twitter.com/RADHAMOHANKUNWA".
